p:
We ran four MCMC chains, each with a 1000-step sample warmup period followed by 1000 saved posterior samples, for a total of 4000 posterior draws. We verified convergence by inspecting trace plots, and confirming that all parameters had sufficiently low Rhat values (all Rhat < 1.005) and sufficiently large effective sample sizes (all neff >16% of total sample size). We visualised posteriors as quantile dotplots
57 to aid in visual estimation of distributions.
